pages.text: Mana Jars store world mana from nearby mana collectors which is used in creating spells and baubles by powering devices like the Glyph Press and Enchanting Apparatus. Mana may be moved using a bucket, or the jar can be picked up and moved. To use mana in a jar, simply place the jar near your desired device. Mana Jars will provide a signal to Redstone Comparators based on their fill level.
